content: in each stitch to next corner * 2dc chain-2 2dc in chain 2 space 1dc st in each stitch to next corner** repeat from * to ** 2 more times join with slip_stitch 19 sts between chain-2 sps 6 slip_stitch to next chain-2 space chain 3 1 double_crochet chain-2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 dcbp around each st to chain-2 corner * 2dc chain-2 2dc in chain 2 space dcbp around each stitch to chain-2 corner** repeat from * to ** 2 more times join with slip_stitch 19 dcbp & 4dc sts between chain-2 sps 7 slip_stitch to next chain-2 space * chain 1 1 single_crochet chain-2 1sc in chain-2 chain-1 skip next st 1sc chain-1 skip next st repeat to next corner ** repeat from * to ** 3 more times join with slip_stitch 13 single_crochet 12 chain-1 sts between chain-2 sps 8 slip_stitch to next chain-2 space * chain 1 1 single_crochet chain-2 1sc in chain-2 chain-1 skip next st 1sc chain-1 skip next st repeat to next corner ** repeat from * to ** 3 more times join with slip_stitch 14 single_crochet 13 chain-1 sts between chain-2 sps 9 slip_stitch to next chain-2 space chain 3 1 double_crochet chain-2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 1dc st in each stitch to next corner * 2dc chain-2 2dc in chain 2 space 1dc st in each stitch to next corner** repeat from * to ** 2 more times join with slip_stitch 31dc sts between chain-2 sps 10 slip_stitch to next chain-2 space chain 3 1 double_crochet chain-2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 1dc st in each stitch to next corner * 2dc chain-2 2dc in chain 2 space 1dc st in each stitch to next corner** repeat from * to ** 2 more times join with slip_stitch 35dc sts between chain-2 sps ____________________________________________________________________________ this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern may not be
